# Project

Building an open data project for the city of Antibes, France to promote the publication of higher quality datasets. The project includes:

-   [Github repository](https://github.com/esteveaq/antibesdata)
-   [Website](https://esteveaq.github.io/antibesdata)
-   [Contributions](https://www.data.gouv.fr/fr/organizations/antibesdata/#/reuses) to the data.gouv.fr platform

# Learnings

Learnings include a mix of problem solving, visual communication and technical knowledge:

-   Real-world data wrangling
-   Data visualization best practices
-   Git and Github practice
-   Static reporing framework (html rendering)
